pages.keybinds.tooltip: All the keybinds that can be added or changed.
pages.values.tooltip: All the values that changes the Zoom Level, UI Level and Camera Position.
pages.miscellaneous.tooltip: All the other options that you can change.
keybinds.subtitle.main.tooltip:
The keybinds that can be added or changed.
These are the main features of the mod.
keybinds.subtitle.camera.tooltip:
The keybinds that can be added or changed.
These are the camera features of the mod.
keybinds.subtitle.toggle.tooltip:
The keybinds that can be added or changed.
These are the toggle of the mod.
keybinds.HoldToChangeUI.tooltip: Keybinds that you need to hold to change the UI.
keybinds.IncreaseZoomOrUI.tooltip: Keybinds to Increase Zoom or UI Level.
keybinds.DecreaseZoomOrUI.tooltip: Keybinds to Decrease Zoom or UI Level.
keybinds.ResetZoomOrUI.tooltip: Keybinds that you use to Reset the Zoom or UI Level.
keybinds.MaxZoomOrUI.tooltip: Keybinds to Max the Zoom in or Maximize the UI.
keybinds.MinZoomOrUI.tooltip: Keybinds to Max the Zoom out or Minimize the UI.
keybinds.ZoomToCurrentMapSize.tooltip: Keybinds to change to zoom level to the approximate current map size.
keybinds.PresetZoomAndUIValues.tooltip: Keybinds to change to zoom level and UI scale to the preset values.
keybinds.MovementCameraUp.tooltip: Changes camera a bit up and locks it.
keybinds.MovementCameraDown.tooltip: Changes camera a bit down and locks it.
keybinds.MovementCameraLeft.tooltip: Changes camera a bit to the left and locks it.
keybinds.MovementCameraRight.tooltip: Changes camera a bit to the right and locks it.
keybinds.MovementCameraReset.tooltip: Resets the camera movement and unlocks it.
keybinds.ToggleUIVisibility.tooltip: Keybinds to toggle the UI Visibility.
keybinds.ToggleHideUIWithCertainZoom.too: Keybinds to toggle the 'Hide UI with Certain Zoom'.
keybinds.ToggleAnyKeyToResetCamera.toolt: Keybinds to toggle the 'Any Button Resets Camera'.
Keybinds to toggle the 'Auto Zoom to Map Size'.
values.subtitle.main.tooltip: All the values that changes the Zoom Level, UI Level and Camera.
values.ZoomOrUILevelIncreaseValue.toolti: The amount of Zoom or UI Level increase.
values.ZoomOrUILevelDecreaseValue.toolti: The amount of Zoom or UI Level decrease.
values.ResetZoomOrUIValue.tooltip: The value of the Zoom or UI level reset.
values.MaxZoomOrUIValue.tooltip: The value of the max Zoom in Level or Max UI.
values.MinZoomOrUIValue.tooltip: The value of the max Zoom out Level or Min UI.
values.ZoomLevelThatHidesUI.tooltip: The value of the Zoom level that hides the UI.
values.CameraMovementSpeedValue.tooltip: The speed that the camera moves.
values.PresetZoomLevelValue.tooltip: The value of the preset Zoom level.
values.PresetUIScaleValue.tooltip: The value of the preset UI Scale.
miscellaneous.subtitle.main.tooltip: All the other options that you can change.
If your controller inputs are supressed or not.
miscellaneous.AutoZoomToCurrentMapSize.t:
If activated it auto zooms to map size.
If not, it will not do that.
miscellaneous.AnyButtonToCenterCamera.to:
If activated your camera centers if any key is pressed.
If not, you will need to press the 'Camera Movement Reset' key.
miscellaneous.HideUIWithCertainZoom.tool: If activated your UI hides when it reaches a certain zoom level.
miscellaneous.PresetOnLoadSaveFile.toolt:
If activated your preset values will update when the file loads.
With the values set on the value tabs.
miscellaneous.ZoomAndUIControlEverywhere: If activated you can control your Zoom and UI Levels anywhere.
hudMessages.AutoZoomToCurrentMapSize.mes: Auto Zoom to Map Size is now: {{value}}
hudMessages.AnyButtonToCenterCamera.mess: Press Any Key to center camera is now: {{value}}
hudMessages.HideUIWithCertainZoom.messag: Hide UI With Certain Zoom is now: {{value}}
hudMessages.PresetOnLoadSaveFile.message: Preset On Load Save File is now: {{value}}
consoleCommands.toggleAutoZoomMap.name: toggle_Auto_Zoom_Map
consoleCommands.resetUIAndZoom.name: reset_UI_and_Zoom
consoleCommands.resetUIAndZoom.descripti:
Usage: reset_UI_and_Zoom <ui> <zoom>
- ui: the decimal value UI scale.
- zoom: the decimal value zoom level.
consoleCommands.resetUI.name: reset_UI
consoleCommands.resetUI.description:
Usage: reset_UI <ui>
- ui: the decimal value UI scale.
consoleCommands.resetZoom.name: reset_Zoom
consoleCommands.reset_Zoom.description:
Usage: reset_Zoom <zoom>
- zoom: the decimal value zoom level.

Press Any Key to center camera is now: {{value}}
consoleMessages.HideUIWithCertainZoom.me: Hide UI With Certain Zoom is now: {{value}}
consoleMessages.PresetOnLoadSaveFile.mes: Preset On Load Save File is now: {{value}}
consoleMessages.resetUIAndZoom.message:
UI Level is now at : {{ui}}
Zoom Level is now at: {{zoom}}
